gpt_comment: ⚠️[DIVERGENT]. Meteoblue predicts a dry day in Paris, conflicting with the baseline's 47% rain forecast. No other data available for comparison. This disagreement makes it a bit of a gamble whether to carry an umbrella or not - don't make a donkey decision, check closer to the time.
